entry.title: Rollback of Xi Jinping's Economic Campaign Exposes Cracks in His Power
entry.content: In addition to pressure from the West on Beijing over Xi’s Russian entente, he is struggling with a severe slowdown in the economy. The new disquiet raises questions about his unassailed dominance.

entry.title: Russia Bombards Kyiv as European Leaders Head to Ukraine's Capital
entry.content: The delegation was set to meet with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky amid heightened fighting in the capital’s outskirts and no apparent progress in talks to end the invasion.

entry.title: Russia's War Rages, Putting Ukraine's Cultural Sites at Risk
entry.content: Experts in cultural property protection are working to safeguard hundreds of heritage sites across Ukraine and protect them from further destruction, as Russia’s offensive continues.
